ygData.subject: Re: Casting Leering Corpse @ Lvl 9
ygData.msgSnippet: I invite anyone to make a dummy character on the Innoruuk server and base him in Qeynos.  At the gate of North Qeynos, my L9 - INT 90 Human SK will cast
ygData.messageBody:
I invite anyone to make a dummy character on the Innoruuk server and base him in
Qeynos. At the gate of North Qeynos, my L9 - INT 90 Human SK will cast leering
corpse tonight at 12 midnight EST for those who dont believe it... Give me a
tell if I'm not there at exactly midnight. The name is Lath. You may be
getting this email too late . I'll be on most of the day Sunday, give me a tell,
and I'll meet up with you & do it then as well. Just setting the record
straight.

Eric Muringer wrote:

> From: "Eric Muringer" <muringer@...>
>
> No way can this be true. SK are part necro's which means Int not Wis.
> I'm thinking people are just screwing up in what they are typing. I mean an
> ogre at lvl 9 can cast leering corpse with 80 int? Bullshit. That just aint
> true.
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <Decodre@...>
> To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
> Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 3:05 PM
> Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Casting Leering Corpse @ Lvl 9
>
> > From: Decodre@...
> >
> > Ok I think I'll shed some light on this subject. Intelligence is not how
> > SK's mana is decided. Enchanters, Magicians, Necromancers, and Wizards
> mana
> > are decided with Intelligence. For Clerics, Druids, Rangers, Shamans,
> > Paladins, and Shadow Knights, Wisdom is the factor that decides the amount
> of
> > mana you get...Higher wisdom..earlier cast those spells at lvl 9. Hope
> this
> > helps.
> >
> > Ranak, Fennin Ro.
> >
> > ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> > Got an opinion?
> > http://www.onelist.com
> > Make it count! Sign up for the ONElist Weekly Survey now.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Are you hogging all the fun?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Friends tell friends about ONElist!
